user_data.target_needs: The main need I wanted to fulfill was finding comfortable footwear that could support me during long hours of activity without causing pain or discomfort.
purchase_reason: I made this purchase primarily for the comfort and support it promised during long hours of activity. The durable leather and cushioning features were particularly appealing, as I needed footwear that could withstand extensive use without causing pain. My previous experiences of discomfort during similar events influenced my decision, leading me to prioritize comfort and support in my choice.

The main reason for purchasing this item was the emphasis on all-day comfort and the specific features like the memory sole comfort insert and performance stretch laces. I was looking for a shoe that would provide a great fit and comfort, which I found appealing based on the product description and my own needs for daily wear. The positive reviews also reinforced my decision.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer high-quality, durable clothing and footwear that offer comfort and a good fit. I value products that are versatile for various activities, whether casual or outdoor, and appreciate features like reinforced construction, breathable materials, and thoughtful design elements that enhance usability. I tend to favor items that have a proven track record of reliability and functionality, as well as those that provide good value for money. Additionally, I enjoy products that are aesthetically pleasing and maintain their quality over time.

Item No.1 : Item Title: <Skechers Men's Max Cushioning Elite-Performance Walking & Running Shoe Sneaker> / Item ID: B08BH27G8W / Price: $89.95 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Shoes', 'Athletic', 'Walking'] / Description: ["Add more cushioned comfort and response to your run with the Skechers Max Cushioning Elite™. A cushioned comfort running and walking design on an ULTRA GO® cushioned platform.\xa0The company's success stems from it's high quality, diversified, and affordable product line that meets consumers' Various lifestyle needs. Since it's inception in 1992, the Skechers diverse product offering has grown from utility style boots to include seven Skechers brands and five uniquely branded fashion lines for men and women. Skechers is an award-winning global leader in lifestyle footwear offering shoes that appeal to trend-savvy men, women and kids everywhere. The brand's styles include the latest innovative athletic, casual and fashion sneakers as well as sandals and boots—with many collections featuring Skechers air-cooled memory foam insoles for added comfort. Plus, Skechers offers a range of slip-resistant work FOOTWEAR for men and women, as well as cool, fun, playful and lighted styles that boys and girls love. Always ahead of the fashion curve, Skechers has made its sport, casual and dress casual shoes essential to every closet."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Skechers Men's GOrun Consistent-Athletic Workout Running Walking Shoe Sneaker with Air Cooled Foam> / Item ID: B0BG317W7D / Price: $51.53 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Shoes', 'Athletic', 'Walking'] / Description: ["Skechers GOrun Consistent is a well-cushioned lace up runner and trainer perfect for a variety of workouts in and out of the gym. The responsive ULTRA GO cushioning midsole and a smooth leather and mesh fabric upper offer an incredibly responsive workout shoe. The company's success stems from it's high quality, diversified, and affordable product line that meets consumers' Various lifestyle needs. Since it's inception in 1992, the Skechers diverse product offering has grown from utility style boots to include seven Skechers brands and five uniquely branded fashion lines for men and women. Skechers is an award-winning global leader in lifestyle footwear offering shoes that appeal to trend-savvy men, women and kids everywhere. The brand's styles include the latest innovative athletic, casual and fashion sneakers as well as sandals and boots—with many collections featuring Skechers air-cooled memory foam insoles for added comfort. Plus, Skechers offers a range of slip-resistant work FOOTWEAR for men and women, as well as cool, fun, playful and lighted styles that boys and girls love. Always ahead of the fashion curve, Skechers has made its sport, casual and dress casual shoes essential to every closet."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Reebok Men's Work N Cushion 4.0 Walking Shoe> / Item ID: B09Z7N2YZQ / Price: $52.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Shoes', 'Athletic', 'Walking'] / Description: ["Stand. Work. Walk. These men's shoes balance long hours on your feet with breathable comfort. The foam sockliner gives every step an air-cushioned feel. In the rush of your shift, a slip-resistant outsole offers confident grip on wet workshop floors or slippery hallways."]
